column4: Squawk>> Okay, then I'm using the wrong terminology. Are programs kept in a specific place in the directory? I mean, logically I wouldn't want to place an application in !/home/blah/pictures.
Ejer>> Thanks. Exactly what I needed.
It's hard to find information on "blank" when "blank" can't be defined. :)
I keep a local dir in my home, same idea as /usr/local
